price: Gospodaru naš, podaj im dvostruku patnju i prokuni ih prokletstvom velikim!”
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِهِمۡ ضِعۡفَيۡنِ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلۡعَنۡهُمۡ لَعۡنٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ātihim ḍiʿ'fayni mina al-ʿadhābi wal-ʿanhum laʿnan kabīran
